item.description: Do you LOVE, LOVE, LOVE Dancing With The Stars? ...well here's your chance to learn the same steps they do while you have a blast AND get in the best shape of your life! Dances include: the Rockstar Rumba, the Hottie Hustle, the Jumpin' Jive, the Sultry Salsa, the Diva Disco, the Cutie-Pie Quick Step, the Miami Mambo, the Crazy Cha-Cha, the Tasty Tango and the Spicy Samba! These classes are structured like an aerobics class so NO PARTNER OR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED AND DROP-INS WELCOME! Be prepared to lose weight AND have FUN! We are currently looking for a location to resume classes. If you have any suggestions, please forward them my way! In the meantime, IF YOU LOVE TO DANCE, you've got to check out one of my other awesome classes! We do all the same steps and rhythms as Cardio Ballroom and I promise you'll love it! For a complete dance and fitness class schedule please visit my website: www.zumbadancewithamy.com. ...and we're now on FACEBOOK! Just go to www.Facebook.com and enter "Zumba Dance with Amy Become a Fan" in the Search Box at the top left of the page. Come feel like a star, get in shape and have fun! Amy

topics_item.name: Dance & Dancing Lessons: Salsa, Latin, Swing

item.name: Cardio Ballroom Dancing
